hero.title: Ibimera by'u Rwanda byiza
hero.subtitle: Kuva mu turubuga dusanzwe n'imirima myiza kugeza ku masoko y'isi
hero.description: Menya ibimera byiza, ibinyampeke n'ibindi bikurwa n'ubwoba mu butaka bw'u Rwanda.

products.title: Ibicuruzwa byacu byiza
products.subtitle: Menya urutonde rw'ibimera bishya, bikurwa mu buryo burambye. Buri gicuruzwa cyubahiriza amahame mpuzamahanga kandi kiraboneka mu bucuruzi bwinshi kwisi yose.

about.title: Gukura neza mu mutima w'u Rwanda
about.description: Greenleaves ihuza ubumenyi gakondo bw'ubuhinzi bw'u Rwanda n'ikoranabuhanga rigezweho. Ubwitange bwacu ku iterambere rirambye n'ubwiza byatumye tuba umufatanyabikorwa wizewe ku baguzi mpuzamahanga bashaka ibicuruzwa byiza byo muri Afurika.

greenhouse.title: Amazu y'ibimera agezweho
greenhouse.subtitle: Ibidukikije bigenzuwe kugirango habeho umusaruro umwaka wose

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Witeguye gushaka ibimera byiza biva mu Rwanda?
contact.name: Amazina yose

footer.description: Ibimera byiza by'u Rwanda bikurwa mu buryo burambye ku masoko y'isi. Umufatanyabikorwa wacu wizewe mu kohereza ibimera byiza.
footer.newsletter_desc: Boneka amakuru ku masaruro, ibicuruzwa bishya n'ubushakashatsi bw'isoko
